title: LAG
body: For some reason i lag hard sometimes... (Have comcast internet) other than getting a direct cord to my router and better internet connection, and moving router close to the window? What else can be done?? its a regularly occouring problem people...{{summoner:4}}

replies.body: Playing on a wired connection is good, but there could be some issues with routing.  Try adjusting your DNS in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help clear up some snags, then test it in a custom game.  Let me know if that helps.
